message-dictionary.message: The Lord of the Rings™, The Rise of the Witch-king™
In order to register your game, you must be connected to the Internet.
If you are not already connected to the Internet, please do so now. Once you are connected, press the Next button to continue.
What should I do if I don't have an Internet connection?
In order to verify your registration or check for exciting promotional offers, you must be connected to the Internet.
If you are not already connected to the Internet, please do so now. Once you are connected, press the Next button to continue.
What should I do if I don't have an Internet connection?
Please be patient - this may take a few moments.

We are unable to contact EA's product registration system. In order to register your product, you must be connected to the Internet. If you are not already connected to the Internet, please do so now.
Once you are connected, press the Try Again button.
What should I do if I can't connect after several attempts?

In order to register your product, you must have an Internet connection.You do not need to register your product in order to play. However, if you wish to register your product, and you are unable to connect to the EA product registration system after several attempts, we suggest the following:
Verify your Internet connection is working.
Contact EA Technical Support. Please reference your game manual for EA Technical Support contact information.
Go to www.eagamereg.com and fill out the web registration form.
We are attempting to contact EA's product registration system. Please be patient, this may take a few moments.
Don't have an Internet connection? It's not a problem!

You can play {client:game-name} without registering the game. If you ever need to call Technical Support, you will be asked to register your game over the phone. Please reference your game manual for the Technical Support number.
Are you sure you want to quit?
By not registering your product you're missing out on some great benefits, including:
• The inside scoop about your favorite EA games
• A free cheat code or game hint for your game!

This version of {client:game-name} cannot be registered. You don't need to register this product in order to play. You can go to www.ea.com to get the latest information on EA products and sign-up for the EA newsletter.
Get a cheat code or game hint for your game and much more!
Register {client:game-name} now and receive these great benefits!
• A free cheat code or game hint for your game!
• The inside scoop about your favorite EA games
Do you want to review your registration information or answer some additional questions for special offers on EA games?
